au.edu.deakin.ice.meltdown

Class Rect

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.deakin.ice.meltdown.Rect

  • public class Rect
extends Object
    Represents a logical rectangle on the screen.

    float posy,
    float width,
    float height)
        Constructs a rect at a certain position and size.
        Parameters:
        posx - The horizontal position of the created rect
        posy - The vertical position of the created rect
        width - The horizontal size of the created rect
        height - The vertical size of the created rect

    • Method Detail

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Vector2 v)
        Tests to ditermine if the provided point is within the bounds of the rect.
        Parameters:
        v - The point to test
        Returns:
        True if the point is inside the rect, false otherwise

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Rect r)
        Tests to ditermine if the provided rect intersects the bounds of the rect.
        Parameters:
        r - The rect to test against
        Returns:
        True if rects intersect, false otherwise

      • GetOverlapRect

        public Rect GetOverlapRect(Rect r)
        Tests to ditermine if the provided rect intersects the bounds of the rect. If so, it returns a rec which represents the area the two rects overlap.
        Parameters:
        r - The rect to test against
        Returns:
        The overlap area
